parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post does not contain a CMF number. While the absence of a CMF number is not automatically disqualifying, it suggests the post might not be directly from a registered candidate or party.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post uses hashtags #echipapentruilfovsenat, #GyőzzönAJózanÉsz, #AlegeVoceaRațiunii, and #UDMR.  #UDMR clearly refers to the Uniunea Democrată Maghiară din România (UDMR) party. The other hashtags likely relate to the party's campaign and candidates, even if not explicitly naming individuals. This suggests that "Article 36 (7) - a" might apply.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience.  The hashtags suggest a broad appeal to voters, not a private communication. Therefore, "Article 36 (7) - c" likely applies.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The hashtags and the overall message strongly suggest an electoral objective. The phrases "Echipa pentru Ilfov Senat" (Team for Ilfov Senate) and "Alege Vocea Rațiunii" (Choose the Voice of Reason) are clearly intended to persuade voters to support the UDMR candidates. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The content does not present itself as journalistic. It lacks objective reporting, analysis, or diverse perspectives. Instead, it promotes a specific political party and its candidates.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post does not express a personal opinion; it's a clear political advertisement promoting the UDMR.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1090600686123484</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post, a paid Facebook advertisement by RMDSZ/UDMR, uses hashtags directly referencing the UDMR party and its campaign for the Senate elections in Ilfov County.  The hashtags and slogans are clearly designed to influence voters to support the UDMR. While it doesn't explicitly name candidates, the context strongly implies an electoral objective. The post's reach is broad due to its paid nature on a public platform.  The absence of a CMF number is a mitigating factor, but not sufficient to negate the clear intent of electoral propaganda.  The timing of the post (end date is after the election) is crucial.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Demeter András István</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>UDMR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
RMDSZ/UDMR, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu hashtag-uri precum #echipapentruilfovsenat și #UDMR, care promovează direct candidatul Demeter András István și partidul UDMR pentru alegerile parlamentare, având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea acestora, fapt demonstrat de conținutul reclamei și de utilizarea unor slogane precum „Alege Vocea Rațiunii”,  și ID-ul postării pe Facebook fiind 1090600686123484.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
